name: Luxury Condominium
description: This stunning and unique property was thoughtfully designed for entertaining and quality of living. It occupies a double sized plot set in the most prime position on the resort!        The home was originally built as a luxurious 4 bedroom villa, and was subsequently extended to create a magnificent home with its own private spa and gym.
